bug.author: jiafatom
bug.description:
Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe. I have a model that need support int32_t for Tile op. Currently Tile only supports float type. System information
ONNX Runtime version (you are using): 1.4.1
Describe the solution you'd like A clear and concise description of what you want to happen. As titled. Describe alternatives you've considered A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered. Additional context Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.
